DTField.Name: PRIORITY
DTField.Label: PRIORITY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Count task priority.

DTField.Name: ASSIGNED
DTField.Label: ASSIGNED
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whither the task is assigned to a user or not.

DTField.Name: USERID
DTField.Label: USERID
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user to which the count task is assigned.

DTField.Name: DOCUMENT

DTField.DTFieldHelp: The type of document that that count is scheduled for.

DTField.Name: ENDTIME

DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which data was added.

DTField.Name: ADDUSER

DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user who added the data.

DTField.Name: EDITDATE

DTField.Name: EDITUSER
